Good morning x

New landing page looks great thank you.

Please go live

With this page can you please turn enquire now into a button so its clearer please - see screenshots

https://www.lovefish.com.au/love-events/



Please make enquire today like this button



Now the form has been removed from this page it looks a bit bare at the bottom.

https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/

can you please add the same photo carousel that's on the events page??

Thanks

Also - our google review boxes have dropped off our website. Can you please fix??

M x

Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

please think of the environment before you print this email

celebrate with us at love.fish this holiday season

There's never been a better time to celebrate outdoor dining! Join us outside at our stunning waterfront location, whether it's a romantic dinner for two or for a group celebration. Let our team help create the perfect end of year event.

NYE

Celebrate New Year's Eve with us at love.fish as we count down to the New Year on the waterfront! Your New Years, Your Way. No set menu requirement, just a $90pp minimum spend on food and beverages from our full a la carte menu. Children under 12 have a $30 min spend, with a kids menu available.

Book online here.

Or for group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

Hi Michelle,

We have updated the Events and Group Menu page. We created a booking draft page for you to review. Once we receive an approval from you, we will update the Book Now on the site.

Here are the links:
https://www.lovefish.com.au/love-events/
https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/
https://www.lovefish.com.au/booking-draft/

Let me know if you have further instructions.

full_threads.body:
Hi,


We have a new event software that has launched called IVVY.


We need to update the enquiry pages so the Ivvy forms are used as they integrate directly into our new software.


I would like to do the following -


Update the 'book now' landing page


Update the enquire today forms on


https://www.lovefish.com.au/love-events/
https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/




the new enquiry form cannot be embedded. It needs to be a link please -


Simple Booking Enquiry Form: https://www.ivvy.com.au/VM-82542-1662-2799838/order/start?v=9a68ac7b1a7749d2617ecef6a3728db1&type=enquire


The new landing page
https://www.lovefish.com.au/reservations/


instead of going straight to open table widget can you please create a new landing page with 2 options.


BOOKINGS 1-9 GUESTS
Please link straight to open table
https://www.lovefish.com.au/reservations/


BOOKINGS 9+ GUESTS
Please link straight to Ivvy form
https://www.ivvy.com.au/VM-82542-1662-2799838/order/start?v=9a68ac7b1a7749d2617ecef6a3728db1&type=enquire


please call me on 0411 653 001 if there are any issues x


Thanks!






Michelle Grand-Milkovic
 Founding Director
https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo

7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700
michelle@lovefish.com.au lovefish.com.au
